au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: AgBE_L2=2m_central_test
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(700,0) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # set beamcentres beamcenterx 96.9 beamcenterz 96.2
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(21, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(21, 0) driveBsz(258)
